item.title: Loss Reserving
item.description: Jump straight to the Interactive Graphic. Introduction Choosing the Movies Deciding on Data Collection Analysis Assigning Gender to Characters Counting Words Visualizing the Data In R In Illustrator Adding Interactivity with d3.js Color Considerations Key Takeaways Future Work Introduction Unlike most of my personal projects, this one didnâ€™t start with a dataset. It started with going to see the newest movie from the Star Wars universe: Rogue One.
